metadata.title: CVE-2022-28041 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: stb_image.h v2.27 was discovered to contain an integer overflow via the function stbi__jpeg_decode_block_prog_dc. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: libstb package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
